ygData.subject: Re: New patch "features"
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Obviously they only tested it with a L1 bard.  At L44, my feet move so fast that the side-to-side wiggle of my torso looks like something out of a Keystone
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 21 Jan 2000, Kenneth E. Bachman wrote:
>
> Hey! I was complaining about them taking away surfing
> well before they actually did it! They kept saying they
> were going to "fix" it, and I've been feedbacking it for a
> month saying I didn't want it to happen. So I'm allowed!
> For those who care, don't get your hopes up that they'll
> take it out. For them to go through all the effort to fix
> it in the first place suggests that they really think that
> this graphic is a lot better. No accounting for taste, is
> there?

Obviously they only tested it with a L1 bard. At L44, my feet
move so fast that the side-to-side wiggle of my torso looks
like something out of a Keystone Kops film.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
